profile:
10% OFF FOR CUSTOMERS DOING HOME RENOVATIONS!!!

Welcome to GC Contracting
Our commitment to your project is reflected in the over 20 years committed from learning from master trade and journeymen.  We will execute on your desired outcome while being transparent and enlightening  on the process.
We love what we do and it will show in the quality and craftsmanship. 
Contact us today to see what is possible.

profile:
KW Property Solutions specializes in top to bottom renovations. We love to take outdated spaces and modernize them with new kitchens, bathrooms, lighting, flooring, trim, paint etc. We work directly with our clients to turn their dreams into a reality. We are most experienced working with real estate investors that need us to gut entire homes and completely renovate them to be flipped or rented. KW Property Solutions also focuses heavily on multi-family unit turnovers with 20+ units completed in the last year. 

There is nothing we cannot do. KW Property Solutions is a full service renovation company and your one stop shop for all projects big and small.
